Open menu In the News Israel-Hamas War Live Updates Hezbollah - Israel Iraq Militias Netanyahu Syria - Hezbollah Gaza - IDF Israeli Hostages Israelis Dead Haaretz | Middle East News Israel Assassinates Hezbollah Drone Chief in Beirut Strike The Israeli military says Mohammed Surur oversaw Hezbollah's drone and cruise missile attacks from Lebanon â–  Dozens of rockets were fired at northern Israeli cities after a 19-hour pause
Yaniv Kubovich Fadi Amun Noa Shpigel Adi Hashmonai Sep 26, 2024 8:23 pm IDT Sep 26, 2024 8:23 pm IDT Share in Twitter

Yaniv Kubovich Fadi Amun Noa Shpigel Adi Hashmonai Sep 26, 2024 8:23 pm IDT Sep 26, 2024 8:23 pm IDT The Israeli military killed Hezbollah's drone chief in an attack in Beirut on Thursday. According to the military's statement, Mohammad Surur commanded the group's operational use of drones and cruise missiles it has launched at Israel.
